column2: *Sarah calls you on the intercom.* Cap. There's a Zorsan ship, they're asking to come closer and that we don't shoot.
A Zorsan ship? What do they want? Why did they contact you? It could be a trap. Henry, get ready to defend ourselves from an attack.
What do they want from us? Why did they contact us?
Captain, I have no idea. They're probably afraid of us. In any case, what do I tell them?
Let's get closer and I'll tell them myself. Keep the weapons trained on them.
